description: This is a personal portfolio website built with React showcasing Yahya Moussair's work as a frontend developer. Features a hero section, about page, and projects gallery with responsive design using Tailwind CSS.
This is an e-commerce web application built with React and Vite. Features a FashionHub brand with shopping cart, favorites, user authentication, and product catalog using Fake Store API integration.
A vanilla JavaScript stopwatch application with start/stop/record functionality. Features millisecond precision timing, lap recording, and clean dark UI styling.

This captures the essence - it's a Hangman game built with JavaScript. The project is a classic word-guessing game with a clean interface, visual hangman progression, hints, and an on-screen keyboard.
